jobDescription: An employer is looking for a Data Engineer to work in Cypress, CA. You will be expected to cleanse and transform data to enable data driven decision making. You also will be expected to have scripting experienc ein python, java and a strong backgorund in data piping developent.  3-5 years of experience as a Data Analyst, Data Engineer, ETL Analyst or ETL Engineer  Experience working with Informatica Powercenter 9.0 or above  Strong understanding of data piping development  Experience data profiling, data cleansing, data preppng  Strong ETL experience (data mapping and loading)  Excellent communication skills  Scripting experience in Python, Spark and/or Java  Experience working with Java API  Experience working with AWS  Experience working with JDBC (Java Database Connectivity)
